biog.entry.name: NEUMANN, the Hon. Shayne Kenneth
biog.entry.description: Biography for NEUMANN, the Hon. Shayne Kenneth
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Blair (Qld)
biog.entry.title: Biography for NEUMANN, the Hon. Shayne Kenneth
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Blair (Qld)
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Blair, Queensland, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary to the Attorney-General from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.
Parliamentary Secretary for Health and Ageing from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Legal and Constitutional Affairs from 19.2.08 to 19.7.10; Petitions from 19.2.08 to 17.6.09; Employment and Workplace Relations from 17.6.09 to 11.2.10; Health and Ageing from 11.2.10 to 19.7.10; Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Affairs from 25.10.10 to 14.5.13; Indigenous Affairs from 4.12.13; Social Policy and Legal Affairs from 25.10.10 to 14.5.13.
Joint Statutory: Public Accounts and Audit from 18.2.08 to 19.7.10 and from 6.2.13 to 14.5.13.
Joint Select: Gambling Reform from 21.10.10 to 13.2.13; Constitutional Recognition of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples from 4.12.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 14.10.13. Shadow Minister for Indigenous Affairs and Shadow Minister for Ageing from 18.10.13.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: President, ALP Raceview Flinders Branch from 1990.
President, Ipswich State Electoral Council 1995-2008; Campaign Director 1998-2007.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-east Queensland, west of Brisbane; it includes most of the city of Ipswich, and the towns of Kilcoy, Toogoolawah, Esk, Cominya, Lowood, Fernvale, Minden, Marburg, Rosewood, and Walloon.
Industries: dairy and beef cattle farming, small crop production, commercial, construction and infrastructure industries, tourism and defence.
StState electorates: Blair includes the Queensland Legislative Assembly electorates of Ipswich, and parts of Bundamba, Ipswich West, Lockyer, Moggill and Nanango.
